features.title: Yenzelwe IMzansi
features.subtitle: I-Purple Glow ayiguqulelwanga nje—iyaqonda isiko. Ukusuka kwislang yaselokishini ukuya kwisiAfrikaans sebhizinisi.

aiEngine.title: Injini Yomsebenzi We-AI
aiEngine.description: I-Gemini 2.5 Flash + Imagen 3 inikela amandla ezithuba zakho. Yenza imibhalo, iifoto nevidiyo ehambelana nabaphulaphuli baseNingizimu Afrika.

multilingual.title: Iilwimi Ezilishumi Elinye, Inkundla Enye
multilingual.description: Thumela ngesiNdebele kusasa, ngesiAfrikaans emini, ngesiNgesi ngokuhlwa. Tshintsha iilwimi phakathi kwesivakalisi.

scheduling.title: Ucwangciso Oluhlakaniphile
scheduling.description: I-AI ifunda amaxesha alungileyo okuthumela kubaphulaphuli bakho. Cwangcisa umsebenzi wenyanga yonke ngemizuzu eyi-10.

step1.title: Chaza I-Vibe Yakho
step1.description: Xelela i-Purple Glow ukuba uthengisa okanye ukhuthaza ntoni. Khetha ithoni yakho: Mzansi Cool, Corporate, okanye Cyberpunk.

step2.title: I-AI Yenza Umsebenzi
step2.description: Injini yethu enikezwe amandla yi-Gemini yenza izithuba ezilungiselelwe iqonga ngeefoto ngemizuzwana.

step3.title: Cwangcisa & Thumela
step3.description: Hlola, lungiselela okanye cwangcisa. I-Purple Glow iphatha okuseleyo—iphinde icebise amaxesha afanelekile okuthumela.

thabo.quote: I-Purple Glow indincede ndikhule ukusuka kuma-500 ukuya kwi-5,000 abalandeli kwiinyanga ezi-3. Umsebenzi wesiNdebele ubetha ngendlela eyahlukileyo.

zanele.quote: Ndikwazi ukuthumela ngeelwimi zonke ezilishumi elinye ngaphandle kokuqesha umguquleli. Into eguqula umdlalo kumashishini aselokishini.

pieter.quote: I-AI iqonda izaci zesiAfrikaans ngcono kunethimba lam lokuthengisa. Ons is baie impressed.
